segments.text: I see the boy reaching for those cookies, and I can’t help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is wobbling, but he’s not giving up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is just waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely missing the whole thing, which is a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get those cookies, even if it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out, but the kids are too focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how brave he is, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but the kids are just being kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, and I hope he doesn’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
